name: Undersea Darkness
description:
Play as Wallace, a wealthy scuba diving lover as you visit the depths of the ocean and reveal the truth about an ancient local rumor.

In Undersea Darkness you will control Wallace, a rich person who loves diving and collecting precious stones. You find yourself in a location rarely frequented by tourists, and for good reason, as it is rumored to be the headquarters of a shadowy and hostile sect quite famous for worshipping a cryptic creature and longing for the end of mankind. 

What seemed like just another diving trip for Wallace turns into a race to save his life, escape from the creature, stay alert on your oxygen and collect the gems that will help you escape from this nightmare.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made as a university project
